statements: UPDATE training_progress SET progress_percentage = 75 WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE training_progress SET learning_curve = '{"topic": "Mathematics", "level": "Intermediate"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE training_progress SET progress_percentage = 75, learning_curve = '{"topic": "Advanced Mathematics", "level": "Expert"}' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE training_progress SET student_name = 'Alice', progress_percentage = progress_percentage + 10 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE training_progress SET training_duration = 60 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE learning_curves SET learning_curve_data = '{"completed": true}' WHERE curve_id = 456;
UPDATE training_progress SET training_score = 95.7, training_duration = 120 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE learning_curves SET learning_curve_data = '{"values": [1, 4, 7, 10]}' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE training_progress SET progress_percentage = 75.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET role = 'Admin' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE training_progress SET progress_percentage = 80 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE user_profiles SET role = 'Admin', email = 'admin@example.com' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE training_progress SET score = 95.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET lecturer = 'Professor Smith', start_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE training_progress SET score = 95.50 WHERE student_id = 123 AND level = 3;
UPDATE courses SET lecturer = 'Dr. Smith', start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2023-05-30' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE training_progress SET training_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE training_id = 1;
UPDATE user_courses SET user_id = 2 WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE training_progress SET progress_percentage = 75.5, training_date = '2022-06-20' WHERE training_id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
UPDATE learning_curves SET curve_data = '{"accuracy": 0.85, "loss": 0.12}' WHERE curve_id = 5 AND user_id = 101;
